lessons.title: The Evolution of the Professional Astrology Practitioner
outline: Tracing the historical shift from deterministic/fatalistic astrology to modern psychological and evolutionary perspectives.

Defining the role of the Certified Astrology Practitioner™: Moving beyond 'horoscopes' to evidence-based chart synthesis.
Introduction to the AccrediPro Standards Institute (ASI) benchmarks for professional astrological excellence.

lessons.title: Mastering The A.S.P.E.C.T. Framework™ Methodology
